name: LOTTERY
message: You won the lottery!

name: IMMO MOGUL
message: Du wurdest zum Immobilienmogul ernannt. Erhalte Mieten im Wert von

name: TICKET DODGER
message: You rode the U-bahn without buying a ticket. Now you have to pay!

name: BAD OWNER
message: One of your properties is infected with termites. Pay for de-bugging!

name: TAXES BACK
message: You get some taxes paid back to you.

name: YOU ARE BEAUTIFUL
message: You won a beauty contest and won a money prize!

name: BACK TO SQUARE ONE
message: Trip around the world (board). Go back to the Start Field!

name: BEST CEO
message: Your company is booming! You get dividends paid out.

name: GOOD INVESTOR
message: You earned money on a sale of some investements!

name: BANK ERROR
message: The bank made a mistake and transferred you extra money.

name: AUTO REPAIRS
message: You crashed your car and have to repair it!

name: BECOME A POLITICIAN
message: You managed to win a local election and are Vienna's mayor. Extra income!

name: BILLS BILLS BILLS
message: Payments for accrued loan interest

name: FAMOUS ARTIST
message: You sold a piece of your artwork. You get paid!

name: LUCKY GAMBLER
message: You won a few rounds at the Casino. You get paid!

name: RICH AUNT
message: Surpise, your aunt was rich and left you some money.

name: YOGA SESSION
message: You did yoga and paid for the session.

name: TREASURE
message: You found a treasure in the garden and sold it for cash.

name: LOST IN VIENNA
message: You got lost in the city and have to go back a few fields.

name: MONOPOLY TOUR
message: Make a full round on the board game.
